pkmkdoc.description: A daemon that allows multiple applications simultaneously to access USB-connected BlackBerryÂ® devices

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf330 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red19\green0\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 The ZooLib BBDaemon lets one or more USB-connected BlackBerrys talk to multiple Mac applications simultaneously.\ \ If you'd like to use both \'91Missing Sync for BlackBerry\'92 and \'91iMobimac Modem\'92, this is what you need.\ \ If you're already using \'91PocketMac for BlackBerry\'92, or \'91BlackBerry Media Sync\'92 then you\'92ll need to uninstall them for BBDaemon to function.\ \ BBDaemon is Open Sourced under the MIT license.\ \ You can build this installer and BBDaemon by fetching revision 521 from the ZooLib Subversion repository at\ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \cf2 \ul \ulc2 http://zoolib.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/zoolib\cf0 \ulnone \ }
